document.full_text: erik soler, the red bulls sporting director and general manager, spoke about the club's acquisition of dwayne de rosario from toronto before saturday night's game against the houston dynamo.
document.title: is de rosario the final piece in the red bulls' puzzle?
lines_and_colors: erik soler, the red bulls sporting director and general manager, spoke about the club's acquisition of dwayne de rosario from toronto before saturday night's game against the houston dynamo.
